comment.author: 59731380@N02
comment._content: It appears this is the Deland Aiport in Florida. I did not do the research so I can't be 100% sure but I did look at some modern pictures and everything looks very similar.

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is the former Suffolk County Air Force Base in Westhampton, Long Island. Today it is better known as Francis S. Gabreski Airport (FOK / KFOK), predominantly a civil airport, which is also home to the 102nd Rescue Squadron (102 RQS) and the 106th Rescue Wing (106 RQW). The point of view is from the southwest looking towards the northeast. See: maps.google.com/maps?rlz=1C1LENN_enUS451US451&gcx=w&a...
